Question: Amidst the chaos, this person's support fell to 20%.
Hints: This person joined the Boy Scouts of America and made Eagle Scout in 1942, after thirteen months in the program.
By the summer this person commanded a lead in the presidential race with thirty-nine percent of the vote.
This person believed in Jobs and did not want to miss out, as he had with his chance to invest in Bill Gates' fledging Microsoft.
